name: Arignar Anna Ilaignar Narpani Manram

address: Madippakkam Village and Post, Cheyyar Taluk

briefDescription: Arignar Anna Ilaignar Narpani Manram is located in Tamil Nadu at Madippakkam Village (Cheyyar Taluk). The objectives & Activities are:1. Charitable Activitiesa. Free Medical Facilities through camps at Rural Areas.b. Awareness about Diseases and Prevention.c. Motivating Village School Children to get Better Education.d. Periodical Cleaning of Drinking Water Tanks at Villages2. Religious Activitiesa. Maintain the Temples Internal and External Environment b. Conduct Pooja during Festivals
